src_original: sa buddhaṃ paśyati /  tatra katamaḥ pratītyasamutpādo nāma?
jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ /  evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /  tatra avidyānirodhāt saṃskārā nirudhyante /  peyālaṃ /
evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
